article_title: Texas doctors head to Austin to discuss regulation, medical education
article_text:
Texas doctors head to Austin to discuss regulation, medical education

For Houston neurologist William Gilmer, running a solo practice gives him the freedom to spend as much time as he needs to figure out what's wrong with his patients. It's like solving a jigsaw puzzle.

og.description: On Tuesday, association members will go to the state capitol in Austin to talk to lawmakers and explain the organization's legislative agenda, which includes preserving the patient-physician relationship and seeking funding for graduate medical education.
og.title: Texas doctors head to Austin to discuss regulation, medical education

It's like solving a jigsaw puzzle.
